column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday August 21 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N at Exit 113 (Paris Pike)
column4: Two lanes are blocked until further notice due to cleanup from a fire involving an empty tanker truck.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N at Exit 113 (Paris Pike)
column4: The entrance ramp from Paris Pike to I-75N is closed.  Motorists may use Newtown Pike to access I-75N.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N at Exit 113 (Paris Pike)
column4: Expect increased congestion on the outer loop of New Circle Rd between Winchester Rd and Newtown Pike.
